trends: There have been no other sightings in Budef

divs: Sighting Detailscoming home in the convertible and looked up and there was just this circular ball moving side ways and then behind a cloud and the next day a black helicopter flew directly over our house and today we drove to my grand fathers and i saw a ufo over there and i haven't seen another black helicopter yet.
Summary: circular ball moving sideways and then behind a cloud
